alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 10:21PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL LAFAYETTE... SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS...SOUTHERN ACADIA AND NORTHWESTERN VERMILION PARISHES THROUGH 1115 PM CST... At 1020 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Arthur, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crowley, Jennings, Rayne, Lake Arthur, Mermentau, Evangeline, Morse, Riceville, Indian Bayou, Egan, Lyons Point, Estherwood, and Midland. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 65 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Northern Acadia; Northern Jefferson Davis; Southern Acadia; Upper Vermilion
